name: ReWinDeD
description:
ReWinDeD is a 3D First Person Shooter. It is
something about a scientist taking over the world. The Rest I wont spoil.

UPDATE : There were a lot of bugs and problems, inlcuding the movement issue, we have fixed them and added improvements and more sfx for guns. Game has been optimized for low end PC. Note : The Graphics is always set to High-End by default, go to Options to set it to low(Select High, then select Low).
Download the update from this link : https://mega.nz/file/BT5DUSrR#fHH7ydF6mCroKYN4LWHHc0t8LOHs1HJGvNKxf5XkhFk

(We cant upload the update on itch as the jam voting is going on)

Full Screen 1920 x 1080 Resolution it should be good. With Adjustable Volume and graphics.

Models - Doctor Ron

Code - ArjunIsCool

Controls:
AWSD - Movement
Left Mouse - Shoot
Space - Hoverboard Fly
R - Reload
Middle Mouse Scroll - Switching Guns.
E - Interact
